title: Can we do something about armor penetration?
body: {{item:3071}} {{item:3036}}  removes 62% of your bonus armor.. is there even any point in building armor anymore? MIght as well just build a fucking {{item:3083}}, it'd make me tankier >.>

replies.body: Unless I understood you incorrectly, using both of those items is actually counterproductive. Black Cleaver's armor shred goes before all percentage armor penetration. This wouldn't be a problem if weren't for the fact that Lord Dominik's Regards only penetrates bonus armor. Therefore, using both items together is counterproductive as Black Cleaver makes LDR's armor penetration LESS efficient.

Only if you look at it from an 'armor reduced' perspective. 

If you calculate relative % damage increase, you aren't actually losing much by buying them together. The only situations where it would be truly counterproductive is if the Black Cleaver caused you to have more HP than the champions on the other team, or where Black Cleaver would reduce their bonus armor to 0 or less.

In the case of BC reducing their bonus armor to 0 or less, LDR is still a good buy if you can use its passive vs the majority of the enemy team.

I ALWAYS buy tabi or omen if I'm stacking armor. No point in buying 6 armored up items. You lose your offense doing that. I grab things like frozen mallet and liandrys and sometimes I slap nashoors on just so I can get the 50% attack speed and then something like hydra or black clever. Tanking isn't as simple as "buy armor magic resist and hp" you can do some pretty crazy stuff with yoomuus blade of the ruined king and wits end up top if you buy things like titanic hydra and deaths dance.

I have only 2 rune pages and I play a LOT of champs so I have generic rune builds that are overly simplified. Magic penetration and ability power and then physical damage and armor penetration. Gives me roughly 36 AP at the start and 8 flat magic penetration with an added 3.3 flat or 7% penetration from masteries. My physical build grants about... 15 damage and 9 penetration respectively. My champ kits and masteries are the main focus for deciding my runes and items. If you haven't taken soraka top you should. It's hilarious because of how abyssal zhonya rylias tabi frozen heart thornmail and pretty much anything you can think of turns her into a crowd controlling unstoppable healer. Just don't buy a lot of hp items. She doesn't need them. Just cool down movement speed  and the proper amount of counter healing items.

*edit one important thing to mention though is stay away from true damage enemies
